definition: A familiarity or awareness of something, often acquired through personal experience or study. It is commonly used to refer to knowledge or understanding of a particular subject, skill, or area of expertise.

examples.german: Ich habe gute Kenntnisse in Deutsch.
examples.english: I have good knowledge of German.

examples.german: Sie hat umfangreiche Kenntnisse in der Programmierung.
examples.english: She has extensive knowledge of programming.

examples.german: Er hat keine Kenntnisse über das Thema.
examples.english: He has no knowledge about the topic.

examples.german: Ich möchte meine Kenntnisse in Mathematik verbessern.
examples.english: I want to improve my knowledge in mathematics.

examples.german: Die Kenntnisse des Bewerbers sind beeindruckend.
